product_desc:
The landscape in consumer fitness is more crowded than ever. And while there’s a surplus of workout programs adept at tracking your fitness activity, there’s a void of services that work to hold your attention and truly motivate you to succeed. That’s where Proday comes in.

Proday is a fitness app for busy people looking to spice up their workout lives. It features a variety of engaging training routines led by fitness celebrities and world-renowned athletes. And it’s simple. All a user has to do is watch an entertaining demo video for their personalized workout and put the moves to work. All activity and personal progress is tracked in-app, and as a user’s fitness increases, the intensity of their training does too. Whether you’re thinking about amping up your current routine or you’re interested in jumping into fitness from scratch, Proday is the app for you.
high_concept: Workout alongside professional athletes. Anytime. Anywhere.
name: Proday
